Instruction: Combine milk, water, butter, and vanilla in a medium bowl. In a separate bowl, mix flour, sugar, and salt. Blend the flour mixture into the milk mixture until smooth. Cover the batter and chill in the refrigerator for 2 hours.

Cook the crêpe in a warm skillet coated with oil. Pour a portion of the batter, swirl the pan to spread it thin, and cook until the edges are crispy. Flip and cook until golden; repeat with remaining batter.
